Package index

All functions

abimo_config_to_config()
Convert Abimo Configuration to List
actual_evaporation_waterbody_or_pervious()
Calculate Actual Evapotranspiration for Waterbodies or Pervious Areas
BERLIN_TYPES_TO_LAND_TYPE_VEG_CLASS_IRRIGATION
Assignment between (NUTZUNG, TYP) and (land_type, veg_class, irrigation)
calculate_delta_w()
Deviation from Natural Water Balance (Delta-W)
calculate_delta_w_1()
Deviation from Natural Water Balance (Delta-W)
data_to_natural()
Transform R-Abimo input Data into their natural scenario equivalent
define_controls()
Define List of "Controls"
distribute_measures()
Distribute Rainwater Management Measures to Single Block Areas
generate_rabimo_area()
Generate an area in R-ABIMO format with default values. All default values can be overridden by entering new key-value pairs.
get_measure_stats()
Get Mean/Max Statistics on Measures
get_potential_evaporation()
Provide Data on Potential Evaporation
get_soil_properties()
Calculate Soil Properties
get_usage_tuple()
Get Usage Tuple (Land_type, Veg_class, Irrigation) from NUTZUNG and TYP
index_string_to_integers()
Convert String of Integer Ranges to Vector of Integer
list_to_data_frame_with_keys()
Convert List of Similar Flat Sublists to a Data Frame
plot_block()
Plot Area Fractions and their Names for one Block
plot_block_2()
Plot Area Fractions of one Block as Part of a Square
prepare_berlin_inputs()
Function to be called when using ABIMO with the 'old' Berlin-data structure
prepare_input_data()
Prepare Input Data: Rename, Add Columns
rabimo_inputs_2020
R-Abimo Inputs (Data and Config) for Berlin, 2020
rabimo_inputs_2025
R-Abimo Inputs (Data and Config) for Berlin, 2025.
range_to_seq()
Sequence of Values Between the Range of Values in a Given Vector
read_column_info()
Provide Meta Information About Input Columns
real_evapo_transpiration()
Calculate Actual Evapotranspiration with Bagrov
run_rabimo()
Run R-Abimo, the R-implementation of Water Balance Model Abimo
run_rabimo_with_measures()
Distribute Rainwater Management Measures and run R-Abimo
test_api()
Test the API to main functions using the plumber package and swagger
triangle_of_fractions()
Plot Triangle of Three Fractions
yearly_height_to_volume_flow()
Convert Yearly Height (mm) to Volume Flow (unit?)
y_ratio_3()
Lookup y_ratio for given x_ratio on a BAGROV curve
